snippet: Young professionals in the coveted STEM fields (science, technology, engineering and mathematics) are discovering they can expand their career future by getting a hybrid master’s degree.
abstract: Universities began adopting programs offering professional science master's degrees, hybrid combining science knowledge with business skills, in late 1990s; degree is becoming increasingly popular among science majors who do not want to spend their careers in a laboratory at time when data analysis and expertise are highly valued in wide range of businesses.
lead_paragraph: Young professionals in the coveted STEM fields (science, technology, engineering and mathematics) are discovering they can expand their career future by getting a hybrid master’s degree.

headline.main: A Degree Where Techie Meets Business Smarts
headline.print_headline: A Degree Where Techie Meets Business Smarts
